message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $13,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your desire to save, but the value of this product is substantial.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  I believe that's a fair compromise.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider this price?
